# _Scripts
Some usefull scripts



### Host enumeration

```
httpx -l ../groww.in/subdomains/all.subs -p 80,443,8080,8443,8000,8008,8888,81,591,2080,2480,7474,5985,5986,1311,4711,5800,8081,9090,8181,8880,3000,3001,5000,5001,7000,7001,9091,9080,9443,10443,18080,28080,38080,48080 -t 200  -o hosts.txt


```
